Body:
"""
        Test that the client can set an attribute.
        """
request_payload = payloads.SetAttributeRequestPayload(unique_identifier='1',
    new_attribute=obj.NewAttribute(attribute=primitives.Boolean(value=True,
    tag=enums.Tags.SENSITIVE)))
response_payload = payloads.SetAttributeResponsePayload(unique_identifier='1')
with ProxyKmipClient() as client:
    client.proxy.send_request_payload.return_value = response_payload
    unique_identifier = client.set_attribute('1', attribute_name=
        'Sensitive', attribute_value=True)
    args = enums.Operation.SET_ATTRIBUTE, request_payload
    client.proxy.send_request_payload.assert_called_with(*args)
    self.assertEqual('1', unique_identifier)
mock.patch('kmip.pie.client.KMIPProxy', mock.MagicMock(spec_set=KMIPProxy))
